description:
This is your opportunity to buy an iconic piece of the Gold Coast – an unrivalled and rare 12,148m2 corner block on the Main River with a palatial traditional style English home. This unique property not only provides a slice of the ultimate Gold Coast lifestyle, but potential to look to the future with the potential to sub divide the estate into 7 parcels of land (STCA).

The home itself was designed by acclaimed architect Roger Parkin, with no expense spared during its construction. Encapsulating the traditional English style of deep coloured timbers, panelled ceilings, plantation shutters and even a third storey bell tower; earning its name "Manor House".
The main home sprawls over 825m2 with the sense of immense space apparent from the moment you open the double doors to the entry foyer. An array of formal and informal living & dining spaces ensure that you will always have plenty of room to entertain guests, whether it be indoors or outside by the river.
The country timber kitchen occupies a large footprint towards the centre of the home and is easily accessible to each of the dining areas. Fitted with stainless steel appliance and quality fittings, there is plenty of space to move and create as you cook.

The sunken lounge is cozy and yet has an open feel, with an open fireplace and large French style doors and windows letting in the magnificent views and breezes from the river. A second living area with polished timber floors and coffered ceiling.
For those who prefer to work at home, a large study makes it easy plus has the added benefit of beautiful water views to help the day go faster.
And if you prefer working out to working, a spacious gymnasium is the place for you (if you prefer it could also be used as a seventh bedroom).
Downstairs also offers a guest wing with its own walk in robe, ensuite and open plan living and dining area with kitchenette.

Upstairs finds the additional 4 bedrooms (two of which are ensuited and have balconies) plus the magnificent master bedroom suite. The master is the ideal retreat for parents with 3 wardrobes, dressing room, large balcony and a marble ensuite with spa and bidet.

The second residence is fully self-contained with 128m2 of floor space and is the ideal place for extended family, long term guests or even a care taker. With 2 bedrooms, a study, spacious kitchen and laundry – the privacy here is assured.

The grounds of the 3 acre (approx.) property have been beautifully maintained, with Everlasting Figs, Palms and Poinciana trees creating green barriers where privacy is required. The pool area is surrounded by manicured lawns and looks out to the river and beyond wth views of the Surfers skyline. The yard by the river is fenced to provide a safe space for children and pets.

The property also caters for the collectors of vehicles with a 4 car garage, workshop/additional garage space, boat shed, boat ramp, 8x9m hangar and even a helipad (STCA).

Features:

Main Residence:
Totalling 6 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms
Large porte cochere to the double door entrance
Spacious entrance foyer
Gymnasium or 7th bedroom
Study with water views
Sunken lounge with fireplace plus second informal living area with timber floors
Formal and informal dining areas
Master suite with 3 wardrobes, dressing room, large balcony and a marble ensuite with spa and bidet
4 additional bedrooms located upstairs – 2 of which are ensuited with balconies
Modern, self-contained guest wing with ensuite, living area and kitchenette
Third story bell tower
Covered alfresco terrace and BBQ area
Multiple additional covered terraces for entertaining and open air patios
5 car garaging (or 4 plus workshop)

Second Residence
Two bedrooms, walk in robe to the master bedroom
Study
Open plan living and dining area
Large kitchen
Full size bathroom with separate laundry
Large covered patio area

The Property
12,148m2 (approximately 3 acres)
69m of main river frontage
Beautifully maintained grounds with Everlasting Figs, large Palms and Poinciana trees
18m riverfront pool
Boat ramp and boat shed
8x9m hangar plus a helipad (subject to council approval)
Plans drawn for a 7 lot subdivision (subject to council approval)

Riverbend Avenue is a highly sought after area of Carrara lined with prestige homes
Central location close to elite schools including All Saints College, Emmanual College and St Vincent's
Easy access to the M1, Broadbeach and Surfers Paradise
Emerald Lakes with it's boutique cafes, restaurants and markets just minutes away

Disclaimer: The above information has not been verified. We advise you confirm the accuracy of details before entering into a contract.
Amir Prestige and its employees cannot be held responsible for any inaccurate details supplied here.
